title: It's December. Where is my Snowday Singed?
body:
Been waiting all year to buy it. Wasn't around when it was an option before.
Other snowday skins are open.
Why not Singed?

replies.body: He (and all the other Snow Day skins) are available now! :)
How about adding a new cass skin?? LOL Its been a minute.

> [{quoted}](name=Escheton,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=6UGEcAAG,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-12-13T08:43:14.670+0000)
> Other snowday skins are open.


Are you maybe referring to bards snowday skin?Because that skin isn't a legacy skin,it is avaliable for the whole year(because it was bards second skin and the second skin of a champion is usually not legacy).
The other snowday skins aren't out either.

> [{quoted}](name=GreenLore,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=6UGEcAAG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-13T11:09:04.865+0000)
>
> Are you maybe referring to bards snowday skin?Because that skin isn't a legacy skin,it is avaliable for the whole year(because it was bards second skin and the second skin of a champion is usually not legacy).
> The other snowday skins aren't out either.

Ah, yeah. That must be it. Thanks.
Yeah I've been wondering where all the winter stuff has been. I know there's some different holiday themed hextech boxes coming out at some point.
